item.description: We will skip the second meeting in December due to the holidays. We plan to spend this single meeting on the Groundwork and then probably two meetings on the Critique of Judgement. For the plan after that please check "NearFuturePlan" file on the "Files" page of this website.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the philosophy group from the staff.
item.name: Kant: Groundwork of the Metaphysics of Morals
